Text: I am a bit of a Tea Crazy (I counted last week and found I have over 40 boxes at home, because I drink a TON of green and chamomile tea and have some others, too. I started drinking Oolong tea about two years ago and really enjoyed it - this one is no exception. You could add honey to it but it tastes very flavourful and sweet without. There's no bitterness to it like there is with some herbal teas without honey. It's a really nice lunchtime/afternoon relaxing tea to have!
